t: Why Melissa & Doug's co-founder is using a traditional retail model to launch her new wellness brand
s: November 6, 2023 - One of the founders of the toy ... wellness brand Lifelines. Melissa Bernstein, who created the kids’ toy company with her husband more than 30 years ago, is decidedly not going direct-to-consumer with Lifelines. Instead, Lifelines — which sells sensory-immersion tools like shower diffusers, scented pencils and essential oil blends — is only available via wholesale, big-box retailers and marketplaces.
